name: Ranger Quest: The Elemental Orbs
description:
A fantasy story full of magic and intrigue that will transport you to a different time and place. Ranger Quest: The Elemental Orbs is a full length puzzle game consisting of 10 levels, each longer and more challenging than the one before it.


Each one of the elemental orbs possesses a magical ability. To unlock these abilities search the libraries to find the ancient spells. You will need to use magic to advance through the levels and challenge Marduk.


Activate shrines and be transported between floors. Only by moving back and forth between floors and shifting the walls of the maze will you be able to find the correct path to the exit.


Ranger Quest is a 2D top down adventure game that combines exploration with the puzzle aspects of a maze. Navigate your way through each level collecting items to complete your inventory. Reach the door that marks the exit and unlock the next level to be explored.

Before starting your quest, make sure to play the prequel story, Ranger Quest: The Adventure Begins.

The Minotaur Maze Engine takes a classic 2D Maze and reinvents it by having the walls move. A game designed to be enjoyable and challenging for players of all ages. For anyone who has enjoyed the simple pleasure of completing a maze at some point in their lives. The Minotaur Maze Engine brings the classic maze into the 21st century.
Developed with the Godot game engine.
Music and sound effects obtained from ZapSplat.
The Minotaur Maze Engine. The maze where the walls move.
